Text: If people ccould please comment and let me know if this torrent is good and the content is good, that would be awesome. This is my first uploaded torrent, and I want to make sure it went up alright. Thanks!

Okay, here you go:

Finally got it seeding properly. It's good to go now :) Please seed everyone, that way this torrent stays around. It's hard to find textbooks as is.
